languages.text: "Я достаточно долго в вашей свите, чтобы признать — вы единственная настоящая власть в Коронусе. Не стану препятствовать, если вы решите оставить что-то себе: эти богатства хотя бы не сгниют, а послужат усилению порядка на ваших мирах. Но основная часть должна направиться в Администратум".

"I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Я достаточно долго в вашей свите, чтобы признать — вы единственная настоящая власть в Коронусе. Не стану препятствовать, если вы решите оставить что-то себе: эти богатства хотя бы не сгниют, а послужат усилению порядка на ваших мирах. Но основная часть должна направиться в Администратум".

I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority should still go to the Administratum."

languages.text: «Llevo en su séquito tiempo suficiente como para reconocerl{mf|e|a} como la única potencia real de la Extensión. No me opondré si decide quedarse con una parte del diezmo; al menos así estos recursos servirán para asegurar el orden en sus mundos en lugar de pudrirse. No obstante, la mayoría debe volver al Administratum».
languages.original_text: "I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: «Llevo en su séquito tiempo suficiente como para reconocerl{mf|e|a} como la única potencia real de la Extensión. No me opondré si decide quedarse con una parte del diezmo; al menos así estos recursos servirán para asegurar el orden en sus mundos en lugar de pudrirse. No obstante, la mayoría debe volver al Administratum».

languages.text: “我已经在你身边呆了很久，我很清楚，你才是整个科罗努斯扩区唯一的支柱。即便你打算将一部分什一税据为己有，我也不会反对。至少，这些资源在你手中不会被白白浪费，你会利用这些资源，巩固众多世界的法律与秩序。话虽如此，绝大部分还是必须交还至内政部。”
languages.original_text: "I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: “我已经在你身边呆了很久，我很清楚，你才是整个科罗努斯扩区唯一的支柱。即便你打算将一部分什一税据为己有，我也不会反对。至少，这些资源在你手中不会被白白浪费，你会利用这些资源，巩固众多世界的法律与秩序。话虽如此，绝大部分还是必须交还至内政部。”

languages.text: 「私は長い間従者として付き従い、あなたが全エクスパンスで唯一の真の力であることを知っています。もし租税の一部を自分のために残すことを決めたとしても、私は反対しません。少なくとも資源が無駄になることはなく、あなたの惑星の秩序を強化するために役立つでしょう。しかし、それでもほとんどは行政局に送られるべきです」
languages.original_text: "I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 「私は長い間従者として付き従い、あなたが全エキスパンスで唯一の真の力であることを知っています。もし租税の一部を自分のために残すことを決めたとしても、私は反対しません。少なくとも資源が無駄になることはなく、あなたの惑星の秩序を強化するために役立つでしょう。しかし、それでもほとんどは行政局に送られるべきです」

languages.text: "Ich bin lange genug in Eurem Gefolge, um zu bestätigen, dass Ihr die einzig wahre Macht in der Ausdehnung seid. Ich werde nicht protestieren, falls Ihr beschließen solltet, einen Teil des Zehnts zu behalten ... dann verrotten diese Ressourcen wenigstens nicht, sondern helfen bei der Stärkung der Ordnung auf Euren Welten. Der Großteil muss dennoch dem Administratum übergeben werden."
languages.original_text: "I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin lange genug in Eurem Gefolge, um zu bestätigen, dass Ihr die einzig wahre Macht in der Ausdehnung seid. Ich werde nicht protestieren, falls Ihr beschließen solltet, einen Teil des Zehnts zu behalten ... dann verrotten diese Ressourcen wenigstens nicht, sondern helfen bei der Stärkung der Ordnung auf Euren Welten. Der Großteil muss dennoch dem Administratum übergeben werden."

languages.text: « Je fais partie de votre entourage depuis assez longtemps pour savoir que vous êtes le seul véritable pouvoir qui tienne dans l'ensemble des Étendues. Si vous décidez de conserver une part de la dîme, sachez que je ne m'y opposerai pas... Ainsi, ces ressources serviront à assurer l'ordre sur vos mondes, au lieu de moisir bêtement dans un coffre. Cela étant dit, la majeure partie de la somme doit tout de même revenir à l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: « Je fais partie de votre entourage depuis assez longtemps pour savoir que vous êtes le seul véritable pouvoir qui tienne dans l'ensemble des Étendues. Si vous décidez de conserver une part de la dîme, sachez que je ne m'y opposerai pas... Ainsi, ces ressources serviront à assurer l'ordre sur vos mondes, au lieu de moisir bêtement dans un coffre. Cela étant dit, la majeure partie de la somme doit tout de même revenir à l'Administratum. »

languages.text: "Tüm Enginlik'teki tek gerçek gücün siz olduğunuzu fark edecek kadar uzun süredir maiyetinizdeyim. Aşarın bir kısmını kendinize ayırmaya karar verirseniz itiraz etmem. En azından kaynaklar çürüyüp gitmez, dünyalarınızdaki düzeni sağlamlaştırmaya hizmet eder. Ancak aşarın büyük çoğunluğu hâlâ Administratum'a gitmeli."
languages.original_text: "I have been in your retinue long enough to acknowledge that you are the only true power in all of the Expanse. I won't object if you decide to leave some of the tithe for yourself — at least then these resources won't rot and instead serve to reinforce order on your worlds. But the majority must still go to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm Enginlik'teki tek gerçek gücün siz olduğunuz fark edecek kadar uzun süredir maiyetinizdeyim. Aşarın bir kısmını kendinize ayırmaya karar verirseniz itiraz etmem. En azından kaynaklar çürüyüp gitmez, dünyalarınızdaki düzeni sağlamlaştırmaya hizmet eder. Ancak aşarın büyük çoğunluğu hâlâ Administratum'a gitmeli."
